destroyCalendar(calendar)

Required library edition:
Required library file: dhtmlxscheduler_minical.js

destroies, previously created, mini-calendar

Parameters:

  • calendar - optional, calendar's object, when called without parameters attempts to destroy last created containerless calendar
	scheduler.destroyCalendar();
	//or
	var calendar = scheduler.renderCalendar(...);
	...
	scheduler.destroyCalendar(calendar);
